EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Grocery.Send Email 2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: What Your Shoppers Want in a Dramatically Different World
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Decoding today’s new consumer behavior: Register for our new Grocery Experience (GX) webinar August 20, 2020 | 1-2pm ET ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> What would you do if you knew that 20% of consumers were up for grabs from your competition?
According to a new NCR survey, 1 in 5 consumers say they will change where and how they shop due to COVID-19 factors. The opportunity is there, but are you prepared?
Register now for our grocery experience webinar with industry analyst firm IHL and leading grocery retailers.
We’ll help you decode the post-COVID shopper, how to serve them and what to do next.
Plus, you’ll get market insights from IHL, discuss predictions and hear first-hand from two NCR grocery customers about what they’re doing to exceed shopper expectations. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Date: August 20, 2020 Time: 1-2pm Eastern Speakers & Panelists:
- Tom Chittenden, Vice President, NCR Retail Products - Greg Buzek, Founder and President of IHL Group - Lou Labenskyj, Chief Information Security Officer of Bashas - Harrison Lewis, CIO of Northgate Market ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
